apps package¶

Submodules¶

apps.app module¶

Shows how to use flask and matplotlib together.

Shows SVG, and png. The SVG is easier to style with CSS, and hook JS events to in browser.

python3 -m venv venv . ./venv/bin/activate pip install flask matplotlib python flask_matplotlib.py
